value:
I am part of the Friege family, which
sets me apart from the rabble around
here. Be wise and act accordingly.

This castle is equipped with all the
niceties my status demands, and yet...
no grand reception?!

The Askr pups called me to battle
again... What tiresome work. Will they
ever learn to ignore childish pursuits?

You! You are the one who brought
me here, are you not? In the future...
leave the chores to the servants, hm?

In battle, victory requires planning.
Treat me with the proper respect,
and I may just teach you how I do it.

Ah. So you finally have the pleasure
of greeting me in person! I assume
you prepared a proper welcome.

Hah! Another successful stratagem!
Truly, a genius like me is something
to be feared!

Hm. Results like this come easy.
Little more than child's play!

This— There must be some mistake!
This can be no fault of mine!

Ah. I see you know how to distribute
your resources properly. How nice
to meet another reasonable person.

To summon me, Lord Kempf, like
this... Impertinence! Prepare to
witness the power of Friege!

I had heard I would be honored as a
"grand Hero" here, and I believed my
fame had spread even to this world...$k$pAnd YET it seems I am cursed to hear
the same damned name everywhere
I go! Reinhardt, Reinhardt, Reinhardt!$k$pIt is no laughing matter! It's shameful
for a Hero like myself to live in the
shadow of a charlatan such as he...$k$pYou! Your mission is to make my
name known among the masses—
and the other Heroes alike!$k$pYes. "There is no other Hero truer,
no mind more brilliant!" That is what
you'll say of me... Yes...$k$pLet none go ignorant of the glorious
Lord Kempf of Friege!
そらっ
Fool!
うぐぐっ…
What is the meaning of...!
Your last mistake.
Impertinent fool.
You're all beneath me!
I will not accept surrender.
It...can't be...
Evil chuckle
You address Kempf, of the royal family of Friege. Mind your manners.
Do not presume to be familiar with me.

All this praise for Reinhardt... Ludicrous!
Name one thing I cannot do better!

Olwen? Yes, I vaguely recall a certain young traitor
by that name. What of it?

Heroes from other worlds... Marvelous.
What a splendid opportunity for us both.
All of Jugdral will revere my name one day. Consider yourself warned.
Did you think I might give you the benefit of my tactical advice? *laugh*
Don't disappoint me.
What is it?
Witness my strategy.
